column1: * 1915 - J.R.R. Tolkien becomes a second lieutenant
column2: and is appointed to the 13th Service Battalion of the Lancashire Fusiliers.

column1: * 1919 - Tolkien is officially released from service
column2: well over a year after the World War Is end.

column1: * 1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien sends Letter to Miss J.L. Curry.
